I got this watch as a reward for myself last year for hitting career milestone. This started a collection thats now five watches deep, and no sign of escape. The rotation finally made it back to this watch. Theres just something about the dial and the colours under warm light, which reminded me why i got this watch in the first place. edit: it #8217;s really hard to hit five hundred characters. im wondering if spaces count towards this number.
if youre gonna spend them.. might as well get POs at 450gems.. build towards christmas/cny events

press the book/encyclopedia tab on the hero screen. shows you all the potential heroes sorted by faction. also shows you which ones you have yet to get. there were also events in the past which gets you rewards based on how many portraits unlocked.
yeah for me it was between this dial and the denim dial.. i felt the black one was a more GADA type then the denim though
go for it.. i tried on a few omegas.. this one had the best overall #8220;feel #8221;
yeah ikr? i like a watch that looks like a watch

so the first watch cured the itch for about 3 months. wanted something dressier. so i got this baby for my birthday last year. looks like low light doesn #8217;t really do the watch and dial justice, so i took another photo. really like the way warm light plays on the champagne dial. the blue gmt hour hand gives a nice contrast to the champagne and steel colours.

WRITING.TITLE: do not buy legendary packs.. got cheated of 2 orange cards..customer service is patronising as usual
do not buy legendary packs... i opened one i got from playing, t3 guarantees 3 epic cards. only got 1. cs is useless and patronising as usual

WRITING.TEXT: so.. tier 3 legendary packs (the gold ones) guarantee you 6 rare cards and 3 epic cards only got 1 epic card messaged customer service and i got a patronising reply back not sure what the problem is... but apparently purple cards are epic now.. would not recommend buying anything from store until this is fixed
